LanguageData.RC2_Ale.label: ale
LanguageData.RC2_Ale.description: Made from wheat, Ale has been a staple drink throughout the ages. Surprisingly nutritious, ale is often drunk instead of water in more primitive societies and has a lower alcohol content than more 'festive' brews.
LanguageData.RC2_Ale.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.RC2_Ale.tools.1.label: neck
